trans-unit.source: (For this example, I'm using Windows and opened the Notepad application, which has a title of "Untitled - Notepad". Most of the effects of these functions can't be seen in text.)
trans-unit.target: (For this example, I'm using Windows and opened the Notepad application, which has a title of "Untitled - Notepad". Most of the effects of these functions can't be seen in text.)

trans-unit.source: Window objects can be minimized/maximized/restored/focused/resized/moved/closed and also have attributes for their current position, size, and state.
trans-unit.target: Window objects can be minimized/maximized/restored/focused/resized/moved/closed and also have attributes for their current position, size, and state.

trans-unit.source: A simple, cross-platform module for obtaining GUI information on and controlling application's windows.
trans-unit.target: Un sencillo módulo multiplataforma para obtener información GUI sobre las ventanas de la aplicación y controlarlas.

trans-unit.source: A simple, cross-platform module for obtaining GUI information on application's windows.
trans-unit.target: Un simple módulo multiplataforma para obtener información GUI en las ventanas de la aplicación.

trans-unit.source: PyGetWindow has functions for obtaining Window objects from a place on the screen, from the window title, or just getting all windows. (hWnd is specific to the Windows platform.)
trans-unit.target: PyGetWindow has functions for obtaining Window objects from a place on the screen, from the window title, or just getting all windows. ( hWnd is specific to the Windows platform.)

trans-unit.source: Still under development. Currently only the Windows platform is implemented. If you want to help contribute, please contact al@inventwithpython.com!
trans-unit.target: Still under development. Currently only the Windows platform is implemented. If you want to help contribute, please contact al@inventwithpython.com!
